ABOUT_ME.TITLE: About me
ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION: I am a front-end developer. I have experience in creating and maintaining web projects using JSF and Angular. I have good knowledge of NestJS and Java for back-end development. I dedicate my free time to learning and specializing, studying new technologies, and applying them to personal projects to improve my skills and understanding.

EXPERIENCE.descricao: Working in web development, specifically in front-end, using the PrimeFaces framework. Learning firsthand the influence of back-end applications on development and the impact of a framework within a web project along with a successful team.

Member of Project ALEX: Conception and Implementation of a virtual platform for Inclusive Hybrid Education and Student-Centered Learning, conceived and led by Professor Breno Jacinto Duarte da Costa, working on the front-end with the Vue.js framework.

Working in web development as a junior developer, specifically in front-end, in a hybrid format. I perform maintenance on old projects and create new web applications, striving to deliver easily readable and well-documented code within the defined deadlines.

Working in web development as a mid-level developer, specifically in front-end, in a hybrid format. I maintain old projects and create new web applications together with the client, striving to deliver easily readable and well-documented code within the defined deadlines.

HOME.INTRO: Here you will find information about my projects and experience.
